website_summaries.verdict: An excellent lightweight reel that is easy to use.
pros: Graphite frame and side plates keep the reel lightweight
Smooth and easy to use without twisting the line
Great for larger fish as well
cons: More expensive than some other brands

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: No real complaints here (pun). The real is solid built, has a generous line capacity and can crank in decent sized fish. I caught a 6ft blacktip from the beach with it without any fear of losing the fish. Cant cast them hardly at all though, meant for trolling. I paddled my baits from the beach with a kayak, so they worked fine for beach fishing that way.
customer_reviews.author: Cody B Harney

customer_reviews.title: Like my expensive reels
customer_reviews.text: Decent reel for the new fishermen on my sled. That is the self wind will keep the line strait. Also a low price for this quality. Like my expensive reels, this one is light. Unlike my thousand dollar rod and reels, this one is very low cost. it also seams to be built decently. Certainly the right reel to place in the hands of those who might drop it over the side. That and I have caught 80 pound bluefin tuna on the same but made years earlier Pen level wind.
customer_reviews.author: euroconec

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have a Penn Fathom but my wife didn't want anything too fancy and just wanted something that would work. So I want with the Squall because it was less expensive than the Fathom but it's still a Penn. I know many reviews say Penn isn't what it used to be but I found that they both work great and I haven't had any issues. Time will tell. I would highly recommend either.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold up to deep sea fishing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these. Retuning both first Fisk caught with these striped out the line leveler. These won’t hold up to deep sea fishing.
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE-KAT

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it on the water yet but have been over the entire rig. Its a beautiful piece of workmanship. Smooth, effortless and very sturdy. Update, finally got to use the rig, absolutely love it !! Smooth and strong. Very happy with it. Will buy another soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Pissed that the CLICKER ISN'T WORKING!
customer_reviews.text: The best reel I have ever owned! The clicker stopped working! Do not recommend if you want the clicker to remain working!!! This is the first one i bought now my second one isn't clicking either! Mostly gar or shark fishing! NEED THE CLICKER TO WORK!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Dirk

customer_reviews.title: Value, dependability and performance.
customer_reviews.text: Penn's customer service is excellent. The reel is a solid, dependable piece of fishing equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat a Penn reel!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the use intended. Bought two of these and they are typical high quality Penn reels. The price was excellent and the vendor shipped promptly with quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: nvr2amzd

customer_reviews.title: Great product from Penn.
customer_reviews.text: I have used a Senator for many years, and will use this one too. Smooth retreaval, good handle and a very well made reel
customer_reviews.author: JUAN R. RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: Great reel have been catching big blue cats on it and it shows no sign of stoping soon
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: great reel must buy
customer_reviews.text: I use the squall 15 for fluke porgy and sea bass I love tree reel I pair them with ugly stik tiger lite elite and big water. I use the 20 and 30s for striped bass best reel ever.
customer_reviews.author: richard monahan

customer_reviews.title: Great reel
customer_reviews.text: Great reel at a great price. Have caught grouper and red snapper on these!
customer_reviews.author: glen hall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reel! pulled 18lb red snapper from 150 ft
customer_reviews.text: Awesome reel! pulled 18lb red snapper from 150 ft, on 40 lb test, just one of a few. The reel worked perfectly each and every time.
customer_reviews.author: gus

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these to go on some custom ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to go on some custom made poles my Dad made over 40 years ago. Put both of them to the test fishing for Rock Cod, Ling Cod, sheepshead and other deep water fish. They performed outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: cclkramer

customer_reviews.title: great reel
customer_reviews.text: was as expected i researched the product before i ordered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but not amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but didnt blow my mind. I use it trolling for salmon in santa cruz, spooled with 40 # mono. The reel is too big for anything besides sitting in rod holder trollin. Handles 20 # salmon no problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a nice reel, it's mounted with line on it
customer_reviews.text: What a nice reel, it's mounted with line on it. Just need to make it to the river. Also at a great price..
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping product as describe. Pound for pound you can't beat a penn reel .
customer_reviews.author: Randy Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for big flatheads.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best reels for catfishing. The drag and power is perfect and For the money you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Upton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for deep sea fishiing. I already had one and got one for him! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Reel Performes Perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great Rockfish Reel. Been using it every weekend since the West Coast Rockfish opening in March and it has performed perfectly. Geat Reel.
customer_reviews.author: Russel E. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for trolling the Chesapeake Bay. I believe I've bought three so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trolling reel. Replaces old Chesapeake Bay standbyet 330GTI. I plan to purchase 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: jerome nicholas jr

customer_reviews.title: Squall 30 Exellent Saltwater Reel
customer_reviews.text: I chose the Penn Squall Reel because I have used Penn Reels all my life salt water fishing. They have always met my expectations and brought home the fish. Its light weight, strong and good looking. The price is about half the price of some of the Japanese reels and I know Penn will always be there if I need a part or service. I'm currently using my Penn Squall 30 tuna fishing off the coast of Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: Michael d. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: best price around
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! filled with 80lb braid and hauled in lots of tuna!
customer_reviews.author: EDDIEAM

customer_reviews.title: so good thats my first time to use it
customer_reviews.text: yes..i caught lingcod,cavisson,rockfish,china...so good thats my first time to use it..
customer_reviews.author: ka mote

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very smooth and highly recommended for a castable big water reel tough and durable
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Very nice reel
customer_reviews.text: First impression..Beautiful! Very nice reel. I ordered 2 Squall 30's. They both came with the saddles. Smooth operating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great reel, I've got 300yds of 80lb POWER PRO ...
customer_reviews.text: Great reel, I've got 300yds of 80lb POWER PRO on it works great on Halibut in the Kachemak Bay and Lower Cook Inlet of Alaska. Very smooth and sure winding great gear ratio
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Great retrive, holds plenty of line
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Great retrive, holds plenty of line. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald O. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We use these for snagging and they hold up well, a lot better than any other reel we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use 27lb Leadcore with backing for trolling, love it!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I caught a 30 pound cod fish and it performed great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it a couple times now and it works great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice reel, and very nice to troll with. Many Hook ups
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reel in the big ones
customer_reviews.text: I love my new reel and it hasn't let me down yet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Penn Reel
customer_reviews.text: The Penn reel was a perfect match for the ugly stick rod for trolling.

customer_reviews.title: ... warm up before i can use it but looks like a very nice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best reel I've ever owned and I've own a lot of reels!!!!

customer_reviews.title: but the service level was that great

customer_reviews.title: No Good ! No Gweno !!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!!! Poor design after looking on those four openings under it ! Even the sand carried by the breese gets in !!! And not to mention the guide ! Stopped working right on the fifth trip! I hate to deal with warranties so I feel more conformable saying my experience!! After opening I saw nothing but plastic gears !!!
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

product_meta.title: Penn SQL30LW Squall LevelWind
product_meta.description: An ideal choice for both hobbyists and serious anglers, the Penn Squall Level Wind Trolling Fishing Reel is ready for work in a variety of saltwater fishing conditions. This trolling fishing reel is built upon the legacy of the illustrious Penn GT series of reels and offers the same proven performance in a more compact package. With a forged and machined aluminum spool and lightweight graphite frame and sideplates, this saltwater fishing reel delivers exceptional reliability without adding bulk to your rod. Its bronze main gear and stainless pinion gear provide exceptional strength and precision to ensure smooth, comfortable cranking. Additionally, the saltwater fishing reel's proprietary greased HT-100 Versa Drag system allows for multiple drag settings and remains cool in the heat of battle, giving you the finesse and power needed to conquer a variety of fish species. An anti-reverse bearing eliminates back play in the handle for instant hook sets, while the Versa-Handle system allows you to choose how long the handle should be. And thanks to its line capacity rings, the spool displays at a glance how much line is remaining.
feature_bullets: Level wind trolling reel for big game fish in a variety of saltwater conditions
Durable construction with lightweight graphite frame and side plates and bronze main gear and stainless pinion gear
HT-100 carbon fiber drag system provides powerful drag without sacrificing smoothness
2 stainless steel ball bearings and instant anti-reverse bearing that eliminates rotor backplay
Forged and machined aluminum spool is braid ready and has line capacity rings marked at 1/3, 2/3, and full capacity
Graphite frame and side plates keep the reel lightweight
Machined high-strength main gear is marine grade bronze alloy
High strength stainless steel pinion gear for the ideal smoothness
HT-100 drag washers remain cool and smooth in the heat of battle
2+1 shielded stainless steel bearing system and anti-reverse

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
